mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT XITM_RACIN_0 AS PNROOT, ITMREF_0 AS PN FROM ITMMASTER WHERE ITMREF_0 LIKE #{pnOrPnRoot} or XITM_RACIN_0 LIKE #{pnOrPnRoot} ORDER BY XITM_RACIN_0 ASC, ITMREF_0 DESC

SELECT ITMREF_0 AS PN, XITM_RACIN_0 AS PNROOT, TSICOD_0 AS Cat, XITM_IND_0 AS Version, YITM_SUP_0 AS WC, ITMDES1_0 AS Desc1, ITMDES2_0 AS Desc2, ITMDES3_0 AS Desc3, ITMSTA_0 AS Status, CREDAT_0 AS CreateDate FROM ITMMASTER WHERE XITM_RACIN_0 = #{pnRoot} ORDER BY XITM_IND_0 DESC, YITM_SUP_0 DESC, PN DESC

SELECT SORDERP.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SORDER.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName, SORDERP.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDERQ.QTY_0 AS QTY, SORDERP.NETPRI_0 AS NetPrice, SORDER.CUR_0 AS Currency FROM SORDERP INNER JOIN SORDERQ ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN SORDER ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 = SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN ITMMASTER ON SORDERP.ITMREF_0 = ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 WHERE SORDERP.NETPRI_0 > 0 AND ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0 = #{pnRoot}

SELECT SQUOTED.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, SQUOTED.SQHNUM_0 AS QuoteNO, SQUOTED.QUODAT_0 AS QuoteDate, SQUOTE.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SQUOTE.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName, SQUOTED.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SQUOTED.QTY_0 AS QTY, SQUOTED.NETPRI_0 AS NetPrice, SQUOTE.CUR_0 AS Currency, SQUOTED.ORDFLG_0 AS OrderFlag, SQUOTED.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO FROM SQUOTED LEFT JOIN SQUOTE ON SQUOTED.SQHNUM_0=SQUOTE.SQHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN ITMMASTER ON SQUOTED.ITMREF_0=ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 WHERE SQUOTED.NETPRI_0 > 0 AND ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0 = #{pnRoot}

SELECT SORDERP.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, MIN(DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0)) AS MIN, AVG(DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0)) AS AVG, MAX(DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0)) AS MAX FROM SORDERP LEFT JOIN SORDER ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0=SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN ITMMASTER ON SORDERP.ITMREF_0=ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 WHERE ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0=#{pnRoot} AND DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0) != 0 GROUP BY SORDERP.SALFCY_0

SELECT STOCK.STOFCY_0 AS StockSite, STOCK.ITMREF_0 AS PN, COUNT(STOCK.QTYSTU_0) AS QTY FROM EXPLOIT.STOCK LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ON ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0=STOCK.ITMREF_0 WHERE ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0=#{pnRoot} GROUP BY STOCK.STOFCY_0, STOCK.ITMREF_0

SELECT ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 AS PN, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0 AS Desc1, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0 AS Desc2, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0 AS Desc3, (CASE WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =1 THEN 'Active' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =2 THEN 'InDevelopment' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =3 THEN 'OnShortage' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =4 THEN 'NotRenewed' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =5 THEN 'Obsolete' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =6 THEN 'NotUsable' ELSE 'UNK' END) AS PNStatus, ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0 AS WC, SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AS ProjectNO, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER AS ITMMASTER ON ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 = SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 = SORDER.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERQ.SOQSTA_0 != 3 AND (ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 !=1 OR ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0 ='NQ') AND SORDERQ.SALFCY_0=#{site}
